title: Which are the famous international musicians and bands that have performed in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey there, Many really good international bands and artists have performed in India over the years.However, since the blacklisting of DNA networks and restrictions implemented by Karnataka government the number of international artists playing in Bangalore has been very less since 2012.Nevertheless, here are a few internationally renowned artists that have played in India; Guns n Roses,Metallica,Iron Maiden,Slayer,Porcupine Tree,Justin Bieber,Coldplay,Lamb of God,Suicide Silence,Cannibal Corpse,Behemoth, Beyonce,Shakira,Megadeth,Akon,Air Supply,Deep Purple and the list goes on.
